topic.title: Can I download zeronet software from zeronet?
topic.body: Is there a zeronet.io mirror here, inside the network? It seems to be logically correct to have the net owner's site in his private network. But I don't see it in the default links.

1573573777_1AShkCrzACE7Gm6gan8WqQMhBfYVd.body: Niggers are tall, strong and hot with their large penises. As they served as slaves, only the best survived, so now they have been uber-humans and will stay that until they accept this equality and tolerance thing.

1573658191_14g2gXnsZdEPShFJkGdh5W3eGXmKz.body: It seems to me that at least the original English SCP Wiki is rather bad for one's mental health and can lead to cuicide. You should be careful reading it and stop immediately if it hurts your feelings or makes sad.

> [goodafternoon](#comment_14_1BL1pFELvZ58apCLcxogy2W66aC4vKLfY3): You haven't happen to be a class C personnel did you?
I don't remember. Take care.

1574929776_144CwRj8eynTUC9DtGHaNHR3wm9P2.body: I think, the scientists also imagined billions of years of Earth's existence. They made it just for evolution to seem natural. Maybe during such long time something would create itself? No, it won't
